com.epam.jwd.task01.logic.validator

Class GemstoneValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.jwd.task01.logic.validator.GemstoneValidator

  • public class GemstoneValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Method for validation of some fields values, specified at the time of creation of new instances of Gemstone.

    Throws IllegalArgumentException if specified values are out of a given range.

      • validateTransparencyLevel

        private void validateTransparencyLevel(int transparencyLevel)
        Validates value, specified in the field transparencyLevel of Gemstone
        Parameters:
        transparencyLevel - an int-type value of an instance of Gemstone transparency. If the value is out of range [0, 100] throws IllegalArgumentException.

      • validateStonePrice

        private void validateStonePrice(java.math.BigDecimal stonePrice)
        Validates value, specified in the field stonePrice of Gemstone
        Parameters:
        stonePrice - a BigDecimal value of price. If the value is less or equal to zero, throws IllegalArgumentException

      • validateStoneWeight

        private void validateStoneWeight(java.math.BigDecimal stoneWeight)
        Validates value, specified in the field stoneWeight of Gemstone
        Parameters:
        stoneWeight - a BigDecimal value of weight. If the value is less or equal to zero, throws IllegalArgumentException
